title: There is Heaven in You Now | Show, Don’t Tell
description:
Ryan talks about the power of turning inward, and reads this week’s meditation from The Daily Stoic Journal.

Get a signed copy of Ryan Holiday’s bestselling book “Stillness is The Key” at the Painted Porch.

Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: https://DailyStoic.com/email

Follow us: Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and Facebook

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
